document_notes.text:
This update for libass fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2020-26682: Fixed a signed integer overflow in the call to outline_stroke() (bsc#1177862).
document_notes.title: Details

notes.text: In libass 0.14.0, the `ass_outline_construct`'s call to `outline_stroke` causes a signed integer overflow.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description
